title: Jescbitcoin
author: Jescbitcoin
content: social mediaBTC  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCw5fce7u-jlmloPrCPWBypwhttps://www.youtube.com/@MexFusionTutoriales/videosi will promote on my social links for 1 monthyou will make payment 0.0008 btc for starteth0xf598c9538af9AB70497742D017d30c39B33c4809btcbc1qv0df8wusun56h4r6a0l58yjv8dyxt49xu7jprndogeDAPQQ1PNqrsgA5H2e46RPXYyUtGR7gykhvltcltc1qtdkeaz29ddlumm2r2mps6cekv0y6nwkfaccrw0bchbitcoincash:qruhkaaesrkk29zzec8uxlpvud2k7f3h4qvs40maarTHORChain (RUNE)thor1t7calu6n3zl6hpp7qwk2z44na2r386tyz4vygxOsmosis (OSMO)osmo1qfg94csr4uzn5lu935pchyuzrs6j4qafepgr0eif you are interested send me a pm...

comments.author: BenCodie
comments.body: I think you should spend a little more time growing your channel before offering promotion. Both of your channels are receiving an average of 10 - 15 views per video at best. You should also describe what is entailed in "sharing" your link. Will you create a video dedicated to what you are promoting? Will it be an advertisement at the start of future videos? Will the link just be in your bio?

comments.author: Emitdama
comments.body: Your first channel has only 24 subscribers and second one has 1.54k but it doesn't seem to have been active since the last video was uploaded 3 months ago, and the videos have an average of 5 views per video which is very low according to what most other promoters that I have been working with.You will need to work a bit on your channels to grow them more popular in terms of views and subscribers and also make your channels more active to offer any services through them. Just my thoughts; probably might help you to get clients quicker than you could assume. Good luck!

comments.author: RikandMorty1
comments.body: As previous members already wrote above, this is probably not the best approach to your advertising business. The best thing to do is to try and grow your channel first and then look for projects to promote and not the other way aroundGood luck tho
